## [WordArt](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art)

### Methods

|                                                                       Method                                                                       |                                           Return type                                           |                                                                                                Brief description                                                                                                |
|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [alignOnPage(alignmentPosition)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#alignOnPage(AlignmentPosition))               | [WordArt](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art)                  | Aligns the element to the specified alignment position on the page.                                                                                                                                             |
| [bringForward()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#bringForward())                                               | [WordArt](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art)                  | Brings the page element forward on the page by one element.                                                                                                                                                     |
| [bringToFront()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#bringToFront())                                               | [WordArt](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art)                  | Brings the page element to the front of the page.                                                                                                                                                               |
| [duplicate()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#duplicate())                                                     | [PageElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/page-element)          | Duplicates the page element.                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [getConnectionSites()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#getConnectionSites())                                   | [ConnectionSite[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/connection-site)  | Returns the list of `Connection``Site`s on the page element, or an empty list if the page element does not have any connection sites.                                                                           |
| [getDescription()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#getDescription())                                           | `String`                                                                                        | Returns the page element's alt text description.                                                                                                                                                                |
| [getHeight()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#getHeight())                                                     | `Number`                                                                                        | Gets the element's height in points, which is the height of the element's bounding box when the element has no rotation.                                                                                        |
| [getInherentHeight()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#getInherentHeight())                                     | `Number`                                                                                        | Returns the element's inherent height in points.                                                                                                                                                                |
| [getInherentWidth()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#getInherentWidth())                                       | `Number`                                                                                        | Returns the element's inherent width in points.                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [getLeft()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#getLeft())                                                         | `Number`                                                                                        | Returns the element's horizontal position in points, measured from the upper-left corner of the page when the element has no rotation.                                                                          |
| [getLink()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#getLink())                                                         | [Link](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/link)                         | Returns the [Link](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/link) or `null` if there is no link.                                                                                              |
| [getObjectId()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#getObjectId())                                                 | `String`                                                                                        | Returns the unique ID for this object.                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [getPageElementType()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#getPageElementType())                                   | [PageElementType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/page-element-type) | Returns the page element's type, represented as a [PageElementType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/page-element-type) enum.                                                         |
| [getParentGroup()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#getParentGroup())                                           | [Group](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/group)                       | Returns the group this page element belongs to, or `null` if the element is not in a group.                                                                                                                     |
| [getParentPage()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#getParentPage())                                             | [Page](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/page)                         | Returns the page this page element is on.                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [getRenderedText()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#getRenderedText())                                         | `String`                                                                                        | Gets the text that is rendered as word art.                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [getRotation()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#getRotation())                                                 | `Number`                                                                                        | Returns the element's clockwise rotation angle around its center in degrees, where zero degrees means no rotation.                                                                                              |
| [getTitle()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#getTitle())                                                       | `String`                                                                                        | Returns the page element's alt text title.                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [getTop()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#getTop())                                                           | `Number`                                                                                        | Gets the element's vertical position in points, measured from the upper-left corner of the page when the element has no rotation.                                                                               |
| [getTransform()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#getTransform())                                               | [AffineTransform](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/affine-transform)  | Returns the page element's transform.                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [getWidth()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#getWidth())                                                       | `Number`                                                                                        | Returns the element's width in points, which is the width of the element's bounding box when the element has no rotation.                                                                                       |
| [preconcatenateTransform(transform)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#preconcatenateTransform(AffineTransform)) | [WordArt](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art)                  | Preconcatenates the provided transform to the existing transform of the page element.                                                                                                                           |
| [remove()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#remove())                                                           | `void`                                                                                          | Removes the page element.                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [removeLink()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#removeLink())                                                   | `void`                                                                                          | Removes a [Link](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/link).                                                                                                                              |
| [scaleHeight(ratio)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#scaleHeight(Number))                                      | [WordArt](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art)                  | Scales the element's height by the specified ratio.                                                                                                                                                             |
| [scaleWidth(ratio)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#scaleWidth(Number))                                        | [WordArt](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art)                  | Scales the element's width by the specified ratio.                                                                                                                                                              |
| [select()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#select())                                                           | `void`                                                                                          | Selects only the [PageElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/page-element) in the active presentation and removes any previous selection.                                          |
| [select(replace)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#select(Boolean))                                             | `void`                                                                                          | Selects the [PageElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/page-element) in the active presentation.                                                                                  |
| [sendBackward()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#sendBackward())                                               | [WordArt](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art)                  | Sends the page element backward on the page by one element.                                                                                                                                                     |
| [sendToBack()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#sendToBack())                                                   | [WordArt](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art)                  | Sends the page element to the back of the page.                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [setDescription(description)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#setDescription(String))                          | [WordArt](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art)                  | Sets the page element's alt text description.                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [setHeight(height)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#setHeight(Number))                                         | [WordArt](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art)                  | Sets the element's height in points, which is the height of the element's bounding box when the element has no rotation.                                                                                        |
| [setLeft(left)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#setLeft(Number))                                               | [WordArt](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art)                  | Sets the element's horizontal position in points, measured from the upper-left corner of the page when the element has no rotation.                                                                             |
| [setLinkSlide(slideIndex)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#setLinkSlide(Integer))                              | [Link](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/link)                         | Sets a [Link](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/link) to the given [Slide](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/slide) using the zero-based index of the slide.  |
| [setLinkSlide(slide)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#setLinkSlide(Slide))                                     | [Link](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/link)                         | Sets a [Link](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/link) to the given [Slide](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/slide), the link is set by the given slide ID.   |
| [setLinkSlide(slidePosition)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#setLinkSlide(SlidePosition))                     | [Link](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/link)                         | Sets a [Link](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/link) to the given [Slide](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/slide) using the relative position of the slide. |
| [setLinkUrl(url)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#setLinkUrl(String))                                          | [Link](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/link)                         | Sets a [Link](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/link) to the given non-empty URL string.                                                                                               |
| [setRotation(angle)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#setRotation(Number))                                      | [WordArt](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art)                  | Sets the element's clockwise rotation angle around its center in degrees.                                                                                                                                       |
| [setTitle(title)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#setTitle(String))                                            | [WordArt](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art)                  | Sets the page element's alt text title.                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [setTop(top)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#setTop(Number))                                                  | [WordArt](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art)                  | Sets the element's vertical position in points, measured from the upper-left corner of the page when the element has no rotation.                                                                               |
| [setTransform(transform)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#setTransform(AffineTransform))                       | [WordArt](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art)                  | Sets the transform of the page element with the provided transform.                                                                                                                                             |
| [setWidth(width)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art#setWidth(Number))                                            | [WordArt](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/word-art)                  | Sets the element's width in points, which is the width of the element's bounding box when the element has no rotation.                                                                                          |
